title: What is the role of desire in magic according to Abraxa and how is it related to complementarity hermetics?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the concept of resurrection and how it is hidden in poetic fables. last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to understand the balance between desire and control in magic, as desire alone cannot lead to successful results.
